amendment.description: To fully fund authorized amounts to implement the Adam Walsh Act that will increase enforcement to catch and detain child predators, combat child pornography, and make the Internet safer for our own children.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4243 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4243 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2065) To fully fund authorized amounts to implement the Adam Walsh Act that will increase enforcement to catch and detain child predators, combat child pornography, and make the Internet safer for our own children.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4243 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4243 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Vitter.
